Module.Content:
<html>

<head>
	<style type="text/css">

button {
  align-items: center;
  background-image: linear-gradient(144deg,#AF40FF, #5B42F3 50%,#00DDEB);
  border: 0;
  border-radius: 8px;
  box-shadow: rgba(151, 65, 252, 0.2) 0 15px 30px -5px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  color: #FFFFFF;
  display: flex;
  font-family: Phantomsans, sans-serif;
  font-size: 20px;
  justify-content: center;
  line-height: 1em;
  width: 100%;
  padding: 3px;
  text-decoration: none;
  user-select: none;
  -webkit-user-select: none;
  touch-action: manipulation;
  white-space: nowrap;
  cursor: pointer;
  margin: 0;
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  ms-transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
}

button:active,
button-64:hover {
  outline: 0;
}

button span {
  background-color: rgb(5, 6, 45);
  padding: 16px 24px;
  border-radius: 6px;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  transition: 300ms;
}

button:hover span {
  background: none;
}

@media (min-width: 768px) {
  .button-64 {
    font-size: 24px;
    min-width: 196px;
  }
}

body {
    background-color: rgb(8,15,19);
}

	</style>
</head>



<script>

async function full() {
    let win = window;

    window.document.documentElement.innerHTML = "";

    window.document.head.innerHTML = `<link rel="preload" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
    <link rel="preload" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto+Mono:ital,wght@0,100..700;1,100..700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">`

    window.document.body.style.backgroundColor = "rgb(8,15,19)";

    let header = document.createElement('h1');
    header.style.top = "50%"
    header.style.left = "50%"
    header.style.transform = "translate(-50%, -50%)"
    header.style.position = "absolute"
    header.style.textAlign = "center";
    header.style.fontFamily = "Roboto Mono"
    header.style.color = "white"
    header.innerText = "No Name Gamez Bootstrapper\nGetting download info..."

    win.document.body.appendChild(header)

    let url = "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/brooklynruff/d@main/other/1v1/1v1lol.html";

    let response = await fetch(url)
    let reader = response.body.getReader();

    let total = parseInt(response.headers.get('content-length'), 10);
    let values = [];
    let loaded = 0

    while (true) {
    let {done, value} = await reader.read();
    if (done) break;
    values.push(value);
    loaded += value.byteLength;

    console.log(loaded/total)

    if ((loaded / total) < 1) {       
        header.innerText = `No Name Gamez Bootstrapper\nDownloading... ${Math.round((loaded/total) * 100)}%`
    } else {
        header.innerText = "No Name Gamez Bootstrapper\nDownloading... 100%!"
    }
    }

    let data = await new Blob(values).text();
    
    header.remove();

    win.document.write(data);
}


</script>

<button onclick="full();">Launch</button>


</html>
